message:
Earlier this morning, Matt Cullen received his 2017 Stanley Cup ring in Minnesota.

Cullen: "It's unique and special seeing these guys. What we went through in the last couple of years is pretty unique. It makes it different than playing another former team." Cully also had a few players over to his house for dinner last night (and some mini-hockey in the basement with his three boys).
